labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Client has fun trying to figure out exactly what happened
data.expected_result: It just doesn't link, or changes the hyperlink to #deleted-channel like it normally would
data.short_description: Clicking on a deleted text channel that was linked via a post sends the client into confusion
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a server and post a link to another channel - Delete said other channel - Return to post and attempt to visit now nonexistent channel - Listen to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PGNiXGX2nLU as the client sits forever trying to load channel.
